page.title: 06POLITICS (CONT)
page.content: national tabloids.In one paper an artical appeared under the title 'ACHTUNG ISLINGTON'.The left wing council has been branded 'communists', 'marxists',and 'extremists'.The red flag flies above the town hall.The papers continue to make big things of the council's firm support for lesbian /gay centres,women's groups.The council has declared Islington a 'Nuclear Free Zone'and have joined the growing support of the anti-abolish the G.L.C campaign.The councillors with the help of the press,have not kept quiet about their policies and beliefs.I think Islington is a very political area and has lots of activities compared to other parts of London.Another widely covered area is the announcement by Chris Smith (M.P) that he is gay.This must have taken a lot of courage.
